intro_only_event_multi_champion_battle_c:
A special Champion Stadium is being held on Pasio
right now!

And I’m sure you’re curious who the final
opponent is, right?
It’s gonna be ME...a Pasio Neo Champion!

You’d better come prepared! I’ll be testing how
effective your day-to-day training has been!
I’ll know if you’re good or not by battling you!
